job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., Some knowledge and experience of AI / ML software engineering

   Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

   Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

   Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design

   Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems

   Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams

   Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

   Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

   Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

   Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies :

   Agile / Scrum

   Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

   Python, JavaScript, Node.js

   React UI / UX

   LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)

   Vector indexing / database, RAG, Agents

   APIs GraphQL, REST

   Docker, Kubernetes

   Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

   SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

   Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

   GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full-stack Software Engineer

This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., Some knowledge and experience of AI / ML software engineering

   Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

   Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

   Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design

   Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems

   Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams

   Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

   Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

   Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

   Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies :

   Agile / Scrum

   Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

   Python, JavaScript, Node.js

   React UI / UX

   LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)

   Vector indexing / database, RAG, Agents

   APIs GraphQL, REST

   Docker, Kubernetes

   Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

   SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

   Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

   GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-centric products, utilizing generative AI for products and productivity, and working with LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models), Vector indexing, RAG, and Agents. While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus is on applying and developing with generative AI technologies, aligning with the definition and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features' directly indicates understanding business needs and translating them into product features.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams' shows an understanding of how new features fit into the broader system and business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML' explicitly mentions the creation of data pipelines, a core component of data engineering for AI/ML.
job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity' indicates direct use and application of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design' implies the exploration and selection of models or AI technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept' suggests experimentation and prototyping with AI/ML related technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as 'Full-stack Software Engineer' and mentions collaborating to 'build new AI centric products', indicating core software development responsibilities.
The phrase 'Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems' covers the full software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'APIs GraphQL, REST' and building 'AI centric products' implies the development of software systems that expose or consume APIs.
The phrase 'React UI / UX' indicates front-end development, a key part of full-stack software engineering for user-facing products.
The inclusion of 'Docker, Kubernetes' and 'Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI' suggests experience with deployment and infrastructure management for AI/ML systems.
The mention of 'Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI' points to cloud infrastructure management, which is crucial for MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS' indicates experience with message queues, often used in distributed systems and MLOps pipelines.
